channel.title: need your opinion on my PC
channel.description:
so when I was in Germany less than a month ago, I bought this PC from a German website, yup I collected it piece by piece and it roughly cost me 750$, though I do find it a great price for this Computer
here's the specs :
CPU Type:
Intel® Core™2 Quad CPU Q9400 @ 2.66GHz
CPU Speed (GHz):
2.69
System Memory GB:
6GB DDR2
Video Card Model:
ATI Radeon HD 5700 Series 1G
Hard Disk Size GB: 1.5 TB
so far I've been able to run high end games at max settings with no problems at all, so what ya think guys ?

item.title: need your opinion on my PC
item.dc:creator: Geeba
item.description:
Yep I have a Q6600 running @ 3.6Ghz - absolutely flys!! demolishes video encoding…

8Gb of RAM and 2 x 8800 GTX in SLi and I’ve still not found a game that my system cant run at max… even thou it is showing its age now…

Read full topic
item.source: need your opinion on my PC

item.description:
Nice one shadi, core 2 quad systems seem to be good little runners.

item.title: need your opinion on my PC
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
good point, I use 1280x1024, but it’s not because of my Card, my monitor is kinda Old-ish I guess I should buy an LCD now

@Fnoigy: dude…is it really hard to read the thread title ?

Read full topic
item.source: need your opinion on my PC

item.title: need your opinion on my PC
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
Actually, modern video cards are optimized for higher resolutions, enough that I’ve seen my GTS250 perform noticeably worse at 1024x768 than 1440x900.

Also, why would you need a forum’s validation of your PC? Enjoy a PC because it does what you want to your satisfaction, not so that others can pat you on the back for it.

Read full topic
item.source: need your opinion on my PC

item.title: need your opinion on my PC
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.description:
I had a Q9450 (pretty much the same as yours), great CPU, if you put on some custom cooling you could easily run it at 3.4/3.6 GHz for daily use (gave me a lot of extra performance).

Also, when you say you can run everything at high, don’t forget to say which resolution you use. I could run any game at highest settings when using 800x600, but 1920x1200 will be trickier.

Read full topic
item.source: need your opinion on my PC
